verses.verse: <S%H5307>Moreover,<s%> when you shall divide by lot the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> a holy <S%H6944>portion<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7341>reeds,<s%> and the breadth shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> in all its <S%H1366>border<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

Of this there shall be for the holy <S%H6944>place<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in length by <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in <S%H7251>breadth,<s%> square all <S%H5439>around;<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> for its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

Of this <S%H4060>measure<s%> you shall <S%H4058>measure<s%> a <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and a <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> and in it shall be the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> which is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

It is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion of the <S%H776>land;<s%> it shall be for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> who come <S%H7131>near<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H4725>place<s%> for their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and a holy <S%H4720>place<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

<S%H6242>Twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H753>length,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> shall be to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> to <S%H6242>themselves,<s%> for twenty <S%H3957>rooms.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> side by <S%H5980>side<s%> with the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1004>portion:<s%> it shall be for the whole house of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Whatever is for the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall be on the one side and on the other side of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> and in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H6921>eastward;<s%> and in <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H5980>answerable<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2506>portions,<s%> from the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> to the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

In the <S%H776>land<s%> it shall be to him for a <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and my <S%H5387>princes<s%> shall no more <S%H3238>oppress<s%> my <S%H5971>people;<s%> but they shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

Thus <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> <S%H5387>you,<s%> princes of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>spoil,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> <S%H7311><s%> <S%H1646>dispossessing<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
You shall have <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1324>bath.<s%>

The <S%H374>ephah<s%> and the <S%H1324>bath<s%> shall be of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8506>measure,<s%> that the <S%H1324>bath<s%> may <S%H5375>contain<s%> the tenth <S%H4643>part<s%> of a <S%H2563>homer,<s%> and the <S%H374>ephah<s%> the tenth <S%H6224>part<s%> of a <S%H2563>homer:<s%> its <S%H4971>measure<s%> shall be after the <S%H2563>homer.<s%>

The <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs.<s%> <S%H6242>Twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> plus <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> plus <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> shall be your <S%H4488>mina.<s%>

This is the <S%H8641>offering<s%> that you shall <S%H7311>offer:<s%> the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> from a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat;<s%> and you shall give the sixth <S%H8341>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> from a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley;<s%>

and the set <S%H2706>portion<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> of the <S%H1324>bath<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> the tenth <S%H4643>part<s%> of a <S%H1324>bath<s%> out of the <S%H3734>cor,<s%> which is <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1324>baths,<s%> even a <S%H2563>homer;<s%> (for <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> are a <S%H2563>homer;<s%>)

and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7716>lamb<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> out of two <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> from the <S%H4945>well-watered<s%> pastures of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>â€”for a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and for peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5002>them,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
All the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall give to this <S%H8641>offering<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

It shall be the <S%H5387>prince<s%>'s part to give the burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and the drink <S%H5262>offerings,<s%> in the <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> and on the new <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and on the <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> in all the appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> the sin <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H259>month,<s%> in the first day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%> and you shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the door <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>ledge<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and on the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

So you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> on the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> for <S%H376>everyone<s%> who <S%H7686>errs,<s%> and for him who is <S%H6612>simple:<s%> so you shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H702>month,<s%> in the fourteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall have the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for himself and for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

He shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

In the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H2568>month,<s%> in the fifteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast,<s%> shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> the like the <S%H7637>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> according to the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> according to the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and according to the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and according to the <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
